org.risk.model

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.risk.model.Link

  • public class Link
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class represent a connection between two states.
    Author:
    Omer

      • Link

        public Link(java.lang.String name,
    State sourceState,
    State destinationState,
    int linkId)
        Constructs and Initialises Link's object based on values receive from parameters
        Parameters:
        name - represents the name of link
        sourceState - is the state object connected to source end of the link
        destinationState - is the state object connected to destination end of the link
        linkId - represents link id and its an int value
